Entry.JapaneseText: おかしい……景色がゆがむ……
Entry.EnglishText: How strange... The scenery is wavering...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、それは陽炎って言うんだヨ！
ひとことでいうと、暑さのせいで、モノが ゆがんだように見える、自然現象のコトさ。
Entry.EnglishText: So basically, it's a natural phenomenon where things seem to be wavering due to the heat.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>は、寒い地方の生まれだから、 見たコトなかったんだね。
Entry.EnglishText: Since it's pretty cold around where you were born, you've probably never seen it before.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、こんなのは初めてだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, this is my first time seeing it...
